styles.name: 2.The Crew Cut
styles.description: A short, tapered haircut that's longer on top.

styles.name: 3.The Undercut
styles.description: A popular style where the hair is short on the sides and longer on top.

styles.name: 3.The French Crop
styles.description: A short, textured style with a fringe at the front.

styles.name: 5.The Ivy League
styles.description: A classic style with a short, tapered back and sides and longer hair on top.

styles.name: 6.The Side Part
styles.description: A classic style with a deep side part and combed hair on top.

styles.name: 7.The Slick Back
styles.description: A popular style where the hair is combed back with a shiny finish.

styles.name: 8.The Textured Crop
styles.description: A short, textured style with a messy finish.

styles.name: 9.The Mohawk
styles.description: A bold, edgy style where the hair is shaved on the sides and spiked on top.

styles.name: 10.The Faux Hawk
styles.description: A less extreme version of the Mohawk with shorter hair on the sides and a longer strip of hair.

styles.name: 11.The Bald Men Anthem
styles.description: This is a shaving style where you are shaved completely with no hair remaining.

styles.name: 12.Box Fade
styles.description: Box fades were made infamous by some of the hottest rappers and ball players back in the late '80s and early '90s. You can still rock this high with a 3-5 cm top or a bit shorter for a tighter look. Who knows, this look may inspire you to write a demo.
